entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries ending after midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
